misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
description: The cipher algorithm is determined by a user-provided string, which may be less secure than the default algorithm.
recommendation: Use a secure and up-to-date cipher algorithm, such as AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding or AES/GCM/NoPadding, and avoid using less secure algorithms like AES/ECB/PKCS5Padding.
